title: Promoting Equity in Mathematics Education Through Media Literacy

context.prior_knowledge: Basic mathematical concepts and digital device utilization skills
context.additional_context: Learners operate in a corporate setting requiring mathematical problem-solving skills, with a collaborative learning space utilizing diverse digital media in a BYOD environment

learning_goals: Learners can critically analyze the impact of media messages on mathematical problem-solving
Learners can collaborate with peers from diverse backgrounds to solve media-based mathematical problems
Learners can recognize the importance of educational equity and consider accessibility elements when designing math educational materials
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
